show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
To Free Your Mind, Give Us A Piece of It! What a week! It’s as if the whole world went mad. <!--more--> Scary thing is, it looks like more of the same is headed our way next week.
Hence, the importance of “Free Your Mind Friday” on Leid Stories.
This is the day we decode and share our thoughts about what has happened, and brace ourselves for what’s likely to come.
  Add your own flavor to this zesty intellectual soup with your take on major issues and events.
Or, fix our gaze on something else entirely.
It’s your call; you decide where the conversation ought to go.
Call 888-874-4888 and be heard!
